variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status_transition == "CLOSED"
| summarize collectDistinct(event.category)

fetch dt.davis.problems
| expand entity_tags
| fields entity_tags
| dedup entity_tags
| append [data record(entity_tags="NONE")]
| limit 10000

fetch dt.davis.problems
| expand labels.alerting_profile
| fields labels.alerting_profile
| append [data record(labels.alerting_profile="NONE")]
| dedup labels.alerting_profile
| limit 100000

1.title: MTTR (wo RCA)
1.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| filterOut (isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id))
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsAdd resolutiontime=(toDuration(resolved_problem_duration))
| summarize close_rs=max(closed_prb),
            resolutionTime=median(resolutiontime),
            by:{event.name}
| fieldsKeep resolutionTime, event.name

2.title: MTTR (with RCA)
2.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd closed_prb = if(event.status == "CLOSED" AND (event.status_transition == "CLOSED"),timestamp)
| filter isNotNull(closed_prb)
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| fieldsAdd resolutiontime=(toDuration(resolved_problem_duration))
| summarize close_rs=max(closed_prb),
            resolutionTime=median(resolutiontime),
            by:{event.name}
| sort resolutionTime, direction:"descending"
| fieldsKeep resolutionTime, event.name

4.title: Incidents
4.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and  event.category == $Severity
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate) and maintenance.is_under_maintenance == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id}
| summarize count()

6.title: Incidents wo Maintenance window
6.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.category == "AVAILABILITY" 
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| filter isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| filter maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize count()

7.title: Incidents
7.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| filterOut isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id}
| summarize count()

8.title: Incidents (with RCA)
8.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and toLong(resolved_problem_duration)>=(toLong($PIT_Selector) * 60000000000) and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| filterOut (isNull(root_cause_entity_id))
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{event.name}
| sort Incidents, direction:"descending"
| fieldsRename event.name, ProblemTitle

9.title: Incidents (wo RCA)
9.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and toLong(resolved_problem_duration)>=(toLong($PIT_Selector) * 60000000000) and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filterOut isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| dedup display_id
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{event.name}
| sort Incidents, direction:"descending"
| fieldsRename event.name, ProblemTitle

10.title: Host graceful shutdown wo maintainence window
10.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_EVENT"
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| filter event.type == "OSI_GRACEFULLY_SHUTDOWN" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| summarize count()

37.title: MTTR (mins)
37.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| filterOut isNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id, resolved_problem_duration}
| summarize close_rs=median(toLong(resolved_problem_duration)/60000000000)

38.title: Total Incidents
38.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED" and event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id}
| summarize Incidents=count()

39.title: MTTR (mins)
39.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind=="DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.status=="CLOSED"  
| filter Not(dt.davis.is_duplicate)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| filter event.category == $Severity and maintenance.is_under_maintenance==false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| filterOut isNotNull(root_cause_entity_id)
| summarize Incidents = countDistinct(display_id), by:{display_id, resolved_problem_duration}
| summarize close_rs=median(toLong(resolved_problem_duration)/60000000000)

41.title: Top Incident-Generating Host Entities or Incident-Causing Hosts
41.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.category == $Severity and event.status_transition == "CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance == false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| summarize cnt= countDistinct(display_id),  by:{root_cause_entity_id, event.name}
| filter contains(root_cause_entity_id, "HOST")
|lookup [fetch dt.entity.host], lookupField:id, sourceField:root_cause_entity_id
| limit 5
|fieldsAdd lookup.tags
| fieldsKeep  cnt, root_cause_entity_id, lookup.entity.name,lookup.tags, event.name
| sort cnt desc
| fieldsRename cnt, Incidents, root_cause_entity_id, HostCausingIncidentUUID, lookup.entity.name, HostCausingIncident, lookup.tags, HostCausingIncidentTags, event.name, ProblemTitle
| fields Incidents, ProblemTitle, HostCausingIncident,HostCausingIncidentTags, HostCausingIncidentUUID

42.title: Top Incident-Generating Processes or Incident-Causing Processes
42.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.category == $Severity and event.status_transition == "CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance == false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| summarize cnt= countDistinct(display_id),  by:{root_cause_entity_id, event.name}
| filter contains(root_cause_entity_id, "PROCESS")
|lookup [fetch dt.entity.process_group], lookupField:id, sourceField:root_cause_entity_id
| limit 5
|fieldsAdd lookup.tags
| fieldsKeep  cnt, root_cause_entity_id, lookup.entity.name,lookup.tags, event.name
| sort cnt desc
| fieldsRename cnt, Incidents, root_cause_entity_id, PGCausingIncidentUUID,lookup.entity.name, PGCausingIncident, lookup.tags, PGCausingIncidentTags, event.name, ProblemTitle
| fields Incidents, ProblemTitle, PGCausingIncident, PGCausingIncidentTags, PGCausingIncidentUUID

| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.category == $Severity and event.status_transition == "CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance == false

| dedup display_id
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)

| filter contains(root_cause_entity_id, "SERVICE")
|lookup [fetch dt.entity.service], lookupField:id, sourceField:root_cause_entity_id

| sort cnt desc
| fieldsRename cnt, Incidents, root_cause_entity_id, SVCCausingIncidentUUID, lookup.entity.name, SVCCausingIncident, lookup.tags, SVCCausingIncidentTags, event.name, ProblemTitle
| fields Incidents, ProblemTitle, SVCCausingIncident, SVCCausingIncidentTags, SVCCausingIncidentUUID

45.title: Top Incident-Generating Application or Incident-Causing Applications
45.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.kind == "DAVIS_PROBLEM" and event.category == $Severity and event.status_transition == "CLOSED" and maintenance.is_under_maintenance == false
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate == false
| fieldsAdd entity_tags = if(isNull(entity_tags), "NA", else:entity_tags)
| expand entityId = affected_entity_ids
| expand tags=entity_tags
| expand alerting_profile=labels.alerting_profile
| filter in($entity_tags, "NONE") OR in(tags,$entity_tags)
| filter in($alerting_profile, "NONE") OR in(alerting_profile,$alerting_profile)
| dedup display_id
| filter toLong(resolved_problem_duration) >= (toLong($PIT_Selector)*60000000000)
| summarize cnt= countDistinct(display_id),  by:{root_cause_entity_id, event.name}
| filter contains(root_cause_entity_id, "APPLICATION")
|lookup [fetch dt.entity.application], lookupField:id, sourceField:root_cause_entity_id
|fieldsAdd lookup.tags
| fieldsKeep  cnt, root_cause_entity_id, lookup.entity.name,lookup.tags, event.name
| sort cnt desc
| fieldsRename cnt, Occurences, root_cause_entity_id, AppCausingIncidentUUID,lookup.entity.name, AppCausingIncident, lookup.tags, AppCausingIncidentTags, event.name, ProblemTitle
| fields Occurences, ProblemTitle, AppCausingIncidentUUID, AppCausingIncident, AppCausingIncidentTags

47.content: ### If there are any graceful shutdowns, it is recommended to have a maintenance window setup!!
